item.description:
The Beehive will be making musical history during their 3rd Annual Bastille Day Celebration on July 14, 2010 from 5:30PM - 2:00AM. The evening will begin as The Beehive?s Patio opens up at 5:30PM, mimicking the Parisian streets complete with pay-as-you-go street food carts, mimes, cocktail specials and many more special surprises with French flair! The Beehive will present Kronenbourg Beer, Remy Martin Fine Champagne Cognac and Cointreau Liquor a the Electro-Lounge Pop sounds of French-born super start ElodieO!

The Beehive will present a special intimate performance by the Grammy award-winning band Deep Forest with special guest Thierry Eliez as they perform their first U.S. show in over a decade in support of their new Album ?Deep Africa.?

Tickets to this 21+ event are only $20.00 in advance or $25.00 at the door (if available). Join in on one of the most authentic and exclusive Bastille Day celebrations in the United States!

For more information or visit beehiveboston.com to get your tickets online!
item.how_to_find_us: It seems like people will arrive at different times. And there is a 50% chance of rain. There is a bank machine kiosk in front of the entrance. Maybe everyone can meet there around 7:30. Feel free to post comments if you have another idea.
item.name: Une nuit a Paris (A Night in Paris) at The Beehive!
